mention.text: those who dare disagree with the Maidan -LSB- coup-imposed -RSB- authorities
Foreign Ministry said in a statement

reason to speak of the start of a witch hunt , mass prosecution of dissidents and political repressions and persecutions against those who dare disagree with the Maidan -LSB- coup-imposed -RSB- authorities
Pavel Gubarev elected a people s governor of Donetsk
the only political prisoner of the Kiev regime
the European Council as well as obligations
the European Council , OSCE and international rights organizations
